member.name: ITfInputProcessorProfileSubstituteLayout.GetSubstituteKeyboardLayout
member.summary: Retrieves the input locale identifier (keyboard layout).
member.param: Contains the class identifier of the text service.
Specifies the language of the profile. See Language Identifiers.
Pointer to an HKL value that specifies the substitute input locale identifier.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfInputProcessorProfileSubstituteLayout
member.summary: This interface is implemented by the TSF manager and is used by an application or text service to manipulate the substitute input locale identifier (keyboard layout) of a text service profile. The interface ID is IID_ITfInputProcessorProfileSubstituteLayout.
